name: Cosmos (itch) (Smart Dog Games)
description:
Cosmos

Free on itch.io. A space scrolling endless shooter.

Teaser:

Hello... Is anyone out there. My ship is under attack, the power is out...

They'll be here soon to destroy the remains of me.......

Is anyone out there........

Here are my coordinates...........
